metadata.title: CVE-2022-49029 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hwmon: (ibmpex) Fix possible UAF when ibmpex_register_bmc() failsSmatch report warning as follows:drivers/hwmon/ibmpex.c:509 ibmpex_register_bmc() warn:  '&data->list' not removed from listIf ibmpex_find_sensors() fails in ibmpex_register_bmc(), data willbe freed, but data->list will not be removed from driver_data.bmc_data,then list traversal may cause UAF.Fix by removeing it from driver_data.bmc_data before free().

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
